category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_tcsync_update
preference.preference_description: Activates the performance monitoring of the Multi-Site Collaboration object update function by the tc_sync utility. For the tc_sync process, the transaction reports the duration of time required to synchronize each modified, published object from the client node operation to the selected sites. There is no corresponding server-side transaction. Valid Values: * ON: Enables performance monitoring of the Multi-Site Collaboration object update function by the tc_sync utility. * OFF: Suppresses performance monitoring of the Multi-Site Collaboration object update function by the tc_sync utility.
